channel.title: XBMC on Paul Cutler
channel.description: Recent content in XBMC on Paul Cutler

item.title: XBMC 13 (Gotham) Beta 1 Out
item.description: XBMC, the best media center for home theater computers, has just released the first beta of the next release, 13.0 (code named Gotham) – go get it! The feature I’m most excited about? After adding PVR integration in XBMC 12.0 Frodo, commercial skip is now available for those using MythTV as a PVR. That, plus the all new audio engine and and a new version for Android devices have me excited to try this out.
